rows.label: tlk70000137_10_msg0002
rows.name:
His Majesty has received tremendous
support all across the world.

rows.label: tlk70000137_10_msg0003
rows.name:
There can't be a more beloved
emperor anywhere.

rows.label: tlk70000137_10_msg0004
rows.name:
It's something all true Superbians take
great pride in.

rows.label: tlk70000137_10_msg0005
rows.name:
As Special Inquisitor, I want to fight
the Holy Grail by His Majesty's side...

rows.label: tlk70000137_10_msg0006
rows.name:
But for the sake of my homeland and
its people, I must restrain myself and
put my duties first.

rows.label: tlk70000137_10_msg0007
rows.name:
I pray for His Majesty's good fortune
in battle.
